content: I volunteered to help @matklad with Hermetic build mode #9506, but the RFC process is a bit too much for my limited cargo/rustc expertise. Keen to help with something more hands on. Any suggestions?
@rimutaka you probably want to ask in the t-cargo stream: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/246057-t-cargo
(Zulip is confusing initially, needs some time to get accustomed to)

@rimutaka hi :wave: here more options to explore good first / mentored in Rust projects
https://forge.rust-lang.org/#help-wanted

Hi, I’m looking for a good first issue recommendation. I’ve got one year experience learning about and building compilers. I’ve built my own compiler and most of my expertise lies at the conversion of AST to IR and IR optimizations. If anyone has a good first task that fits this skill set please let me know!
hi! you might want to look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md and the rustc dev guide https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org if you haven't already
I’ve taken a look at these resources and also looked at the #help-wanted section on GitHub. Came to post here to see if anyone had any recommendations based of my prior knowledge and skillset

If you'd be interested in working on a lint, I just opened this issue after a conversation in today's lang meeting: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/87318

Hopefully it should be a relatively small change, and not too difficult.
Sorry, I missed this thread when asking my question in t-compiler/help. I'd be interested in doing this if nobody has started yet.
